channel.title: [Help] Linksbros Grand exchange!
channel.description:
hi can some1 please help me with linksbros grand exchange
basicly Ive got a database on my localhost setup but I need a way of knowing the item ids for each item
like if I can rightclick a item and see the item id
or if a command so type ::items
and a list show items with the id next to them
Ive been trying hard to find how to do this but I cant find on mopar or google
and plz dont say search bar because ive tryed loads of times on here and google and other forums
plz comment ty! =)

item.title: [Help] Linksbros Grand exchange!
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

If you mean you want a command to find ids for different items…
wouldn’t a quick google search work. I typed this in and it was the first result.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("getid")) { String a[] = playerCommand.split(" "); String name = ""; int results = 0; for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) name = name + a[i]+ " "; name = name.substring(0, name.length()-1); c.sendMessage("Searching: " + name); for (int j = 0; j < Server.itemHandler.ItemList.length; j++) { if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null) if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ").toLowerCase().contains(name.toLowerCase())) { c.sendMessage("<col=255>" + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ") + " - " + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId); results++; } } c.sendMessage(results + " results found..."); }

Sorry if I’m getting the wrong end of the stick

Read full topic
